name: Android Retro Goof Games Bundle
description:
A bundle of 6 fast, glitchy, small, silly, retro style 2D Android arcade games.

FEATURING!

HYPNO MEDUSO : Be hypnotised by spaced-out animals.

GET WELL SOON : You are the heart tapping doctor we need.

ASTRIAN FLOCK : An endless space shooter.

GIVE ME RAINBOTS : Tap the bots to match the colour.

TOAST CATCH : Quick! Grab the toast before it sticks to the ceiling.

SEASIDE SMASHER : A physics based childish tantrum at the beach.

All games created in Pocket Code for Android.

Android Retro Goof Games Release v1.0 zip contains all the games with the Pocket Code wrapper to run on your Android device, as well as game instruction pdf. Download zip to Android, unzip & install - remember to change your settings to allow installs from unknown sources.

Android Retro Goof Games Release v1.0 & Game Music zip file contains all the games plus music in mp3 format from Give Me Rainbots & 7 extra tracks (23 minutes in total) from some of my other games.
